properties.description: Facilities: Accessible toilets, Accessible access in and out of the building, Fully accessible access throughout the building, Changing facilities, Car park, Free WiFi access, Available power sockets for people to use, Kitchen, Facilities to make hot food/drink (kettle/microwave), Secure building

properties.address: Little Paxton - St James' Church, High Street, PE19 6EY
properties.description: Facilities: Accessible toilets, Accessible access in and out of the building, Power sockets for people to use, Facilities to make hot food and drinks - kettle/microwave, Secure building, Hearing loop, Screen or television, Access to free activities, eg board games, jigsaws, drawing and colouring resources
